Content.Question:
Top tips for first aid
1. If you cut your finger put a plaster on it.
2. If you are stung by a bee and there's some bad swelling,
phone the doctor.
3. If you develop a rash put some cream on it.
4. If someone faints, make sure they are comfortable and wait for
them to come round.
5. If you have a temperature, taken an aspirin.
6. If you burn yourself in the sun, come inside and keep
cool.
7. If you're taking a course of antibiotics, make sure you finish them.
8. If you feel dizzy, lie down and have a rest.
